title: How bonding smite to the jungle item ruined Fiora's jungle
body:
Way back when Fiora was amazing...

People didn't know it but she was once the best jungle of all!

Those days changed long ago even before Riot punished me for my expert game play with the Fiora rework. 

Making hunter's machete require smite ruined my jungle and that was the 1st time Riot picked on me. 

It allowed me to get red without need of smite.

Fiora needs flash and ignight...

replies.body:
how many junglers actually give you their first red?
and if you take it from them and let them fall behind, why should anyone care for your opinion?
I believe he just jungled without smite, I think he was the jungler.

> [{quoted}](name=lnfernal Nasus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=leqvk3AJ,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-10-27T19:39:42.769+0000)
>
> I believe he just jungled without smite, i don't think he had a jungler.

who does that outside of bronze 5?
Some people just do what they wanna do man, theres a diamond player who takes orianna mid with smite, the world is filled with some crazy people who just love to break the meta man.

> [{quoted}](name=lnfernal Nasus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=leqvk3AJ,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-27T19:41:56.575+0000)
>
> Some people just do what they wanna do man, theres a diamond player who takes orianna mid with smite, the world is filled with some crazy people who just love to break the meta man.

that orianna can at least secure objectives...
you're right about that, I enjoy breaking the meta with some junglers, my favorite off meta junglers currently are {{champion:43}} {{champion:163}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:4}}
Smiteless Fiora jungle was op!  You just didn't know...
What are some other champions that don't require smite?   Like shako is one...
In the current jungle it's hard to jungle without smite, but a list of some who can are {{champion:78}} {{champion:62}} {{champion:43}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:427}} {{champion:90}}
If it was OP then why should it be allowed?
You need to get banned from these boards, honestly you do. @F3ORA
